geocode_en.formatted_address: Island Centre, 1 Great George St, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong

result.adr_address: Island Centre, 1 Great George St, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: Island Centre, 1 Great George St, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
result.name: Sweetheart Garden Restaurant

reviews.text:
Sweetheart Garden Restaurant is nice and long lasting Hong Kong style steak house, with reasonable price in this busy Causeway Bay area.
They offer a wide range of steaks, price from below $100 to few hundreds.  Although not all their steaks are premium one, but you can always enjoy the steak that fit your budget in here.  Unlike other steakhouse, their restaurant is more like a local restaurant.  And you should not miss their famous sizzling steak, that putting huge amount of sauce to your steak iron plate

I purchased the Grade A rib eye steak, cooked medium rare.  It was disgusting, worst steak that I have ever had.  A steak like this should be very juicy and tender.  Instead it was dry and very chewy.  It was so bad, you couldn’t finish a bite with out having to choke it down.  If you see the picture I uploaded, you’ll see the plate is completely dry, without any of those delicious juices.  The steak knife could hardly get through it.  The seer on the stake was unusual, it looked closer to a seer you would find on a pork chop.  I’ll never eat here again.
Good food good price.However,  they place bread in the cupboard which I think is illegal and a violation of health safety code. Plus, they use microwave oven to heat bread.
good location , price reasonable , the restaurant needs to do some remodeling, will increase customer 's appetite ,also can help more business
Attentive staff, good old fashioned Hong Kong style steak

result.adr_address: 香港銅鑼灣記利佐治街1號金堡中心
result.formatted_address: 香港銅鑼灣記利佐治街1號金堡中心
result.name: 花園餐廳

reviews.text: 其實班侍應咁厭世不如唔好做啦？ 唔係鐵板既扒又煎唔熟，絕對係一間多分店既垃圾餐廳，早d摺左去開花園冰室啦，屌你個西！
食物質素一般，不建議去，你會非常失望。
湯同麵包ok! 但d肉類唔新鮮，豬扒同牛腩都好難食，即食即吐！價錢平是有原因的！
地方較中等，约千弍叁尺左右，服務較好，食物质素較高，在銅鑼湾區、同區價錢較相宜，字號老。
食物ok, 價格不太貴。 可能附近食肆多，位唔爆， 幾好。

result.vicinity: 銅鑼灣記利佐治街1號金堡中心

result.adr_address: Hong Kong, Causeway Bay, Great George St, 1號金百利廣場4樓R1號鋪
result.formatted_address: Hong Kong, Causeway Bay, Great George St, 1號金百利廣場4樓R1號鋪
result.name: Chili Party

reviews.text:
Chili Party is awesome for their spicy food and friendly staffs.
The restaurant is easy to reach, as it's located right next to the Sogo, and it's the heart of Causeway Bay! 
And the food here is great, you can choose the level of spicy based on your preference.  Staffs here are friendly, they are willing to explain what is the difference between dishes, and keep the restaurant clean.  Price here is reasonable, it's not that expensive for the food in this area.
Although I don't really agree with their restaurant decoration with a dark theme design, but all other aspects are great
Inattentive and forgetful service - despite surplus of staff. Substandard food quality. Smudges and grease in “clean” dishes. Never coming back again.
Loved it!!! Water cooked fish... Lots if fish couldn't finish it between three of us. Very generous with portion sizes
Food was stellar. Their spicy levels top notch and the restaurant has a good vibe. If they skip the american music, they’d have a home run! Will definitely come again. Also, rather inexpensive!

Worth to try if you like hot and spicy food. But waiting for left to go up there is a pain. Highly recommend sweet and sour pork (for those people don't like hot and spicy) Sichuan style fish (for those love HOT)!

result.vicinity: 金百利廣場4樓R1號鋪, 1號 Great George Street, Causeway Bay

result.adr_address: 香港銅鑼灣記利佐治街1號金百利廣場4樓R1號鋪

result.name: 麻辣派對

reviews.text: 食物種類都算多，有辣有唔辣。但叫得麻辣派對就梗係吃辣啦！食物份量都算幾多，配菜用料豐富，服務態度ok。但環境比較昏暗，唔適合影相。

Chili Party is awesome for their spicy food and friendly staffs.
The restaurant is easy to reach, as it's located right next to the Sogo, and it's the heart of Causeway Bay! 
And the food here is great, you can choose the level of spicy based on your preference.  Staffs here are friendly, they are willing to explain what is the difference between dishes, and keep the restaurant clean.  Price here is reasonable, it's not that expensive for the food in this area.
Although I don't really agree with their restaurant decoration with a dark theme design, but all other aspects are great
短時間內已經同家人去咗3次 服務態度都算ok 位置都幾好坐 都算多嘢食多選擇 價錢唔算貴 嘢食好野味好好食 唔係好食得辣嘅人可以叫BB辣 有香味得嚟唔會好辣 連我阿爸呢個唔食得辣嘅人都接受到👍👍 不過我地就對佢地個紅燒牛腩小麵有d失望(無影到) 本身牛腩同個麵都唔錯 但個湯底竟然係出前一丁麻油麵陣味 (我同阿爸都係咁覺得) 令我地覺得好奇怪

份量好夠
麻婆豆腐好惹味
酸辣粉有啲太lum 無乜咬口
魚骨魚鱗，應有盡有，食辣野仲要比熱水，威到爆
